code_value: Questions 1~2   You have just transferred to a new school, and you are not familiar with your new school. Ask your deskmate two questions about the school.</br>Questions 3~4  One of your friends invited you to go to an art exhibition with him. Ask him two questions about the art exhibition.
Questions 1~2   You have just transferred to a new school, and you are not familiar with your new school. Ask your deskmate two questions about the school.
Questions 3~4  One of your friends invited you to go to an art exhibition with him. Ask him two questions about the art exhibition.
